title: Fairy Realm Crossing Adventure #69
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Enchanted Fairy Garden
rooms.description: You find yourself in a luminous garden where oversized flowers glow with bioluminescent light. Tiny fairy lights dance through the air like living stars. A babbling brook winds through beds of crystalline flowers that chime softly in the breeze. Mushroom circles dot the mossy ground, and a magnificent willow tree stands at the garden's center. The air shimmers with magic and smells of honeysuckle and starlight.

items.name: ancient willow tree
items.description: A massive willow with silver bark and leaves that shimmer like moonlight

items.name: silver acorn
items.description: A perfectly formed acorn made of solid silver, warm to the touch

items.name: fairy ring of mushrooms
items.description: A perfect circle of glowing toadstools that pulse with magical energy

items.name: chronicle of the crossing
items.description: A tiny book written in flowing script that glows as you read it
items.text: The Fairy Realm Crossing was established in the year 1369 by Queen Titania. Three sacred truths guard the path home: Know the Queen's name, know where the portal dwells, and know what you seek. The Moonstone Key opens all fairy locks.

items.name: bed of crystal flowers
items.description: Flowers made of living crystal that chime melodiously when touched

items.name: note written on a petal
items.description: A message inscribed on a crystalline rose petal
items.text: Dear traveler, the combination to the lily cluster is the year our realm was founded - 1369. Queen Titania herself blessed this garden. The Moonstone Key within will help you on your journey.

items.name: moonstone key
items.description: A key carved from pure moonstone that glows with inner light

items.name: fairy treasure box
items.description: A delicate box made of woven starlight and morning dew, sealed with a moonstone lock

items.name: pouch of fairy dust
items.description: A silk pouch filled with shimmering golden dust that sparkles with magic

items.name: letter from Queen Titania
items.description: An elegant letter sealed with a crown of flowers
items.text: Welcome, lost traveler. I am Queen Titania, ruler of this realm. To return home, you must pass through the Mystic Grove to reach the Portal Glade where the gateway stands. Only those who understand our ways may pass. Carry fairy dust for protection.

items.name: enchanted brook
items.description: A stream of liquid starlight flowing over smooth stones

items.name: glowing water lily
items.description: A luminous lily floating on the water's surface

items.name: gate of living vines
items.description: An archway formed of flowering vines that leads deeper into the fairy realm. It requires the silver acorn to open.

rooms.name: Mystic Grove
rooms.description: A mystical forest grove where ancient trees with faces carved in their bark watch your every move. Fireflies the size of your fist illuminate the twilight air. Glowing mushrooms create pathways of light across the forest floor. A stone circle stands at the grove's heart, and ethereal music seems to emanate from the trees themselves. The air is thick with enchantment and possibility.

items.name: speaking oak tree
items.description: A massive oak with a wise, weathered face carved into its trunk
items.text: The oak's voice echoes in your mind: 'Greetings, traveler. Queen Titania rules these woods with grace and wisdom. The portal you seek lies in the Portal Glade beyond. To pass through my guardian door, you must prove your knowledge of our realm.'

items.name: ancient stone circle
items.description: Seven standing stones arranged in a perfect circle, each carved with fairy runes
items.text: The stones are inscribed with the history of the realm: 'Here Queen Titania holds court. Here the portal to the mortal world opens in the Portal Glade. Here travelers seek passage home.'

items.name: hollow fairy log
items.description: A fallen log covered in luminous moss with a hollow interior

items.name: sprite's journal
items.description: A tiny journal belonging to a forest sprite
items.text: Day 47: Queen Titania visited the grove today! She reminded us that the portal in the Portal Glade is the only way home for lost travelers. I must remember to tell visitors: they seek passage home, our queen is Titania, and the portal dwells in the Portal Glade.

items.name: shelf of giant mushrooms
items.description: Enormous glowing mushrooms growing in tiers like natural shelves

items.name: map of the fairy realm
items.description: A living map that shows the layout of the realm
items.text: MAP OF THE FAIRY REALM: Enchanted Garden (entrance) → Mystic Grove (current location) → Portal Glade (exit portal). The Portal Glade contains the gateway home. Queen Titania's palace lies to the east, but the portal is your destination.

items.name: fountain of wishes
items.description: A crystal fountain filled with water that reflects starlight

items.name: vial of starlight water
items.description: A vial filled with water from the fountain that glows softly

items.name: guardian door of thorns
items.description: A magnificent door woven from living rose vines and thorns. Three questions are carved into a wooden plaque beside it, glowing with fairy magic.

password_questions.question: Who rules the fairy realm?
password_questions.hint: Check the chronicle, the queen's letter, and the speaking oak's words

password_questions.question: Where does the portal dwell?
password_questions.hint: The map and multiple texts mention where the gateway is located

password_questions.question: What do you seek?
password_questions.hint: The sprite's journal and your goal make this clear

rooms.name: Portal Glade
rooms.description: You have reached the Portal Glade! A circular clearing bathed in ethereal moonlight, even though it seems to be perpetual twilight. In the center, a swirling portal of silver and blue light hovers above the ground, its surface rippling like water. Flowers of every color imaginable bloom in perfect circles around it. Queen Titania herself stands beside the portal, her wings shimmering with rainbow light. She smiles warmly and gestures toward the gateway home.

items.name: gateway portal
items.description: A magnificent portal swirling with silver and blue energy, showing glimpses of the mortal world beyond

items.name: Queen Titania
items.description: The radiant queen of the fairies, beautiful and ageless, with wings like stained glass
items.text: Queen Titania speaks in a voice like silver bells: 'Well done, brave traveler. You have solved the mysteries of my realm and proven yourself worthy. Step through the portal, and you shall return home safely. May you always remember your time in the Fairy Realm Crossing.'

items.name: throne of flowers
items.description: An elegant throne woven from living flowers and vines where the queen holds court

items.name: stone of blessing
items.description: A smooth stone that radiates warmth and comfort

items.name: fairy blessing token
items.description: A small token that glows with protective magic, a gift from the realm

rooms.win_message: With Queen Titania's blessing, you step through the shimmering portal. The fairy realm fades away as you feel yourself pulled through space and magic. Moments later, you emerge back in the mortal world, forever changed by your adventure in the Fairy Realm Crossing. The portal closes behind you with a soft chime, leaving only the memory of magic and wonder. You win!
